Actions.Name: Beetle Horn
Effects: Deals bonus damage against foes at exactly range 2.

Actions.Name: Side Harpoons
Actions.Description: The [name] deals 3 damage to a foe in range once for each mounted ally. A foe can only be damaged once by this ability.

Actions.Name: Beetle Rampage
Actions.Effects: The [name] rushes up to 2 spaces. When it ends this movement, all adjacent foes take 2 damage and are shoved 1.

Actions.Name: Main Harpoon
Actions.Description: A foe in range must save or take 2[D]+[fray], become slashed, and be shoved until adjacent to the [name]. On a success, the foe takes [D]+[fray] and is shoved 2 towards the [name] instead.
